alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 1:56PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of southeastern Tooele County through 245 PM MDT... At 155 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm capable of gusty outflow winds 10 miles south of Dugway English Village, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Tooele Army Depot South, Skull Valley, Rush Valley and Faust. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
